short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control browser alert windows. Block by default or on specific websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Stop the browser alert dialogs from taking over the tab!

Configure to block all alerts or filter by site. View blocked alerts by clicking the icon. Can now block confirm and prompt dialogs as well.

Questions? Contact me at alertcontrol@s13.us
